title: クレーンゲームに挑戦！

text_block_list.text: One day, while out with Matikanetannhauser――

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah! Look, Trainer! There's a 'Paka Puchi'!
Looking in the direction Matikanetannhauser pointed, there was a crane game with stuffed toys modeled after Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: They're so cute～. Just looking at them makes me want one!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...No, but I decided to get a spider stuffed toy today, so I'll have to resist this one...
choice_data_list: Then I'll get the 'Paka Puchi' for you
Then I'll get the 'Paka Puchi' for you

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hehe. Thank you～. Do your best, Trainer!
